objectsIntl.subtitle: Curated object sets for non-Turkish languages
objectsIntl.noCuratedSet: No curated set for this category yet.

random.title: Random Mode
random.subtitle: Play a mix of selected activities

letterSound.title: Letters and Sounds
letterSound.subtitle: Learn letters and sounds, spell and read.

concepts.title: Concept Activities
concepts.subtitle: Learn colors, shapes and opposite concepts.

fiveWOneH.title: 5W1H
fiveWOneH.subtitle: Who • What • Where • When • Why • How

programMode.title: Program Mode
programMode.subtitle: Start a short, guided learning session.
programMode.dailyLimitMessage: You can advance up to 1 unit per day. A new unit will unlock tomorrow!

explainer.point1: Provides a short, focused flow from concrete to abstract.
explainer.point2: Progresses through 10 units. Each unit contains specific concepts.
explainer.point3: Content is dynamically selected based on mastery: warmup, new content, and reinforcement.
explainer.point4: You can advance up to 1 unit per day. This is the recommended pace for solid learning.
explainer.point5: Parents can temporarily unlock activities using the Joker Pass.

sessionRules.title: Program Mode Rules
sessionRules.dailyLimit: Daily limit: You can advance up to 1 unit per day
sessionRules.jokerInfo: Joker Pass: Parents can temporarily unlock activities

planPreview.title: Today's Flow
planPreview.ifGood: If it goes well, next session:

q_who_to_when_sick.question: Who do we go to when we get sick?
q_who_to_when_sick.correct: Yes! We go to the doctor when we are sick.
q_who_to_when_sick.wrong: No, that's not where we go when we are sick.

q_who_to_when_fire.question: Who do we call when there is a fire?
q_who_to_when_fire.correct: Correct! We call the firefighters in a fire.
q_who_to_when_fire.wrong: No, in a fire we should call the firefighters.

q_who_uses_this.question: Who uses this?
q_who_uses_this.correct: Yes! A teacher uses the blackboard.
q_who_uses_this.wrong: No, it is usually used by a teacher.

q_who_brings_letter.question: Who brings the letter?
q_who_brings_letter.correct: Correct! The postman brings the letter.
q_who_brings_letter.wrong: No, the postman brings the letter.

q_what_brush_teeth_with.question: What do we brush our teeth with?
q_what_brush_teeth_with.correct: Yes! We brush our teeth with toothpaste.
q_what_brush_teeth_with.wrong: No, we don't brush our teeth with that.

q_what_eat_with.question: What do we use to eat?
q_what_eat_with.correct: Correct! We use a fork to eat.
q_what_eat_with.wrong: No, we don't use that to eat.

q_where_doctor_works.question: Where does a doctor work?
q_where_doctor_works.correct: Yes! A doctor works at a hospital.
q_where_doctor_works.wrong: No, a doctor works at a hospital.

q_where_is_swing.question: Where is the swing?
q_where_is_swing.correct: Correct! The swing is at the playground.
q_where_is_swing.wrong: No, the swing is at the playground.

q_where_do_we_sleep.question: Where do we sleep?
q_where_do_we_sleep.correct: Yes! We sleep in a bed.

q_where_fish_lives.question: Where do fish live?
q_where_fish_lives.correct: Yes! Fish live in an aquarium.

q_when_see_owl.question: When do we see owls?
q_when_see_owl.correct: Correct! We see owls at night.
q_when_see_owl.wrong: No, owls are usually seen at night.

q_when_use_umbrella.question: When do we use an umbrella?
q_when_use_umbrella.correct: Yes! We use an umbrella when it rains.
q_when_use_umbrella.wrong: No, we don't use an umbrella then.

q_when_wear_beanie.question: When do we wear a beanie?
q_when_wear_beanie.correct: Correct! We wear a beanie when it snows.
q_when_wear_beanie.wrong: No, we don't wear a beanie then.

q_why_icecream_melted.question: Why did the ice cream melt?
q_why_icecream_melted.correct: Yes! Ice cream melts because of the sun.
q_why_icecream_melted.wrong: No, that's not why ice cream melts.

q_why_clothes_neat.question: Why are the clothes neat?
q_why_clothes_neat.wrong: No, that doesn't make them neat.

q_how_go_to_school.question: How do we go to school?
q_how_go_to_school.correct: Yes! We go to school by school bus.
q_how_go_to_school.wrong: No, we don't usually go that way.

q_how_open_door.question: How do we open the door?
q_how_open_door.correct: Yes! We open the door with a key.
q_how_open_door.wrong: No, we don't open the door with that.

q_how_baby_feels.question: How does the baby feel?
q_how_baby_feels.wrong: No, the baby doesn't feel that way.

q_where_is_sleeping_child.question: Where might this child be sleeping?
q_where_is_sleeping_child.correct: Yes! We usually sleep in a bed.
q_where_is_sleeping_child.wrong: No, we usually sleep in a bed.

q_why_child_wants_play.question: Why does this child want to play?
q_why_child_wants_play.correct: Correct! To have fun and play with friends.
q_why_child_wants_play.wrong: No, usually to have fun with friends.

q_where_child_wants_to_go_outside.question: Where might the child want to go outside?
q_where_child_wants_to_go_outside.correct: Yes! The child may want to go to the park.
q_where_child_wants_to_go_outside.wrong: No, usually the park is desired.

q_why_child_tired.question: Why might this child be tired?
q_why_child_tired.correct: Correct! Due to long play or little sleep.
q_why_child_tired.wrong: No, usually because of long activity or little sleep.

q_where_child_wants_go_park.question: Where does this child want to go?
q_where_child_wants_go_park.correct: Yes! Wants to go to the park.
q_where_child_wants_go_park.wrong: No, not to a different place.

q_how_child_prefers_drive.question: How does this child travel by car?
q_how_child_prefers_drive.correct: Correct! Wearing a seatbelt and with a parent.
q_how_child_prefers_drive.wrong: No, it should be safely with an adult.

q_when_rhino_active.question: When are rhinos generally more active?
q_when_rhino_active.correct: Correct! Depending on species, day or twilight.

q_where_camels_live.question: Where are camels usually found?
q_where_camels_live.correct: Yes! In deserts and dry areas.

q_where_fish_live_915.question: Where do fish usually live?
q_where_fish_live_915.wrong: No, they don't live out of water.

q_who_flies_plane.question: Who flies the plane?
q_who_flies_plane.correct: Yes! A pilot flies the plane.
q_who_flies_plane.wrong: No, they don't fly the plane.

q_who_cuts_hair.question: Who do we go to for a haircut?
q_who_cuts_hair.correct: Correct! A barber cuts our hair.
q_who_cuts_hair.wrong: No, they don't cut our hair.

q_who_provides_milk.question: Who provides us with milk?
q_who_provides_milk.wrong: No, it is usually provided by a farmer.

q_what_erase_text.question: What do we use to erase writing?
q_what_erase_text.correct: Correct! We use an eraser to erase.
q_what_erase_text.wrong: No, we don't erase with that.

q_what_measure_height.question: What do you use to measure height?
q_what_measure_height.correct: Yes! We use a ruler to measure height.
q_what_measure_height.wrong: No, we don't measure height with that.

q_what_dry_after_bath.question: What do we dry ourselves with after a bath?
q_what_dry_after_bath.correct: Correct! We dry ourselves with a towel after a bath.
q_what_dry_after_bath.wrong: No, we don't dry with that.

q_where_to_eat.question: Where do we go to eat?
q_where_to_eat.correct: Yes! We go to a restaurant to eat.
q_where_to_eat.wrong: No, we don't go there to eat.

q_where_to_read_books.question: Where can we go to read books?
q_where_to_read_books.correct: Correct! We can go to the library to read books.
q_where_to_read_books.wrong: No, that's not a good place to read books.

q_where_to_shop.question: Where do we shop?
q_where_to_shop.correct: Yes! We shop at the market.

q_when_go_to_bed.question: When do we go to bed?
q_when_go_to_bed.correct: Correct! We go to bed at night.
q_when_go_to_bed.wrong: No, we don't go to bed then.

q_when_go_to_beach.question: When do we go to the beach?
q_when_go_to_beach.correct: Yes! We go to the beach when it's sunny.
q_when_go_to_beach.wrong: No, we don't go to the beach then.

q_when_make_snowman.question: When do we make a snowman?
q_when_make_snowman.correct: Correct! We make a snowman when it snows.
q_when_make_snowman.wrong: No, we don't make a snowman then.

q_why_child_cold.question: Why is this child cold?
q_why_child_cold.wrong: No, that's not why they're cold.

q_why_hair_wet.question: Why is this hair wet?
q_why_hair_wet.correct: Correct! It's wet because of a shower.
q_why_hair_wet.wrong: No, that's not why it's wet.

q_how_reach_high_shelf.question: How do we reach a high shelf?
q_how_reach_high_shelf.correct: Yes! We use a ladder to reach.
q_how_reach_high_shelf.wrong: No, we can't reach with that.

q_how_travel_at_sea.question: How do we travel at sea?
q_how_travel_at_sea.correct: Correct! We travel by ship at sea.
q_how_travel_at_sea.wrong: No, we don't usually travel by that at sea.

q_how_clean_room.question: How do we clean the room?
q_how_clean_room.correct: Yes! We clean the room with a cleaning bucket and supplies.
q_how_clean_room.wrong: No, we don't clean the room with that.

q_who_teaches_at_school.question: Look at the picture. Who teaches us at school? Pick the right person.
q_who_teaches_at_school.wrong: No, at school the teacher teaches.

q_what_do_we_drink_water_with.question: Which one do we use to drink water? Choose carefully.
q_what_do_we_drink_water_with.correct: Yes! We drink water with a glass.
q_what_do_we_drink_water_with.wrong: No, we don't drink water with that.

q_where_do_we_store_books.question: Where do we keep books? Pick the right place.
q_where_do_we_store_books.correct: Correct! We keep them on a bookshelf.
q_where_do_we_store_books.wrong: No, we keep books on a bookshelf.

q_when_use_sunscreen.question: When do we use sunscreen? Choose the right time.
q_when_use_sunscreen.wrong: No, we usually use it when it's sunny.

q_why_wash_hands.question: Why do we wash our hands? Pick the healthy reason.
q_why_wash_hands.correct: Correct! To be clean and protect from germs.
q_why_wash_hands.wrong: No, we wash hands to be clean.

q_how_dry_hands.question: After washing hands, how do we dry them? Choose the right method.
q_how_dry_hands.correct: Yes! We dry them with a towel.
q_how_dry_hands.wrong: No, we dry hands with a towel.

1.question: What do we do when it rains?

4.question: How do we clean our hands?

5.question: What happens if you drop this?

7.question: What happens if you break a vase with a hammer?

8.question: What do we wear when it snows?

9.question: What does a baby do when hungry?

10.question: How do we smooth a shirt?

11.question: What do we do when night comes?

13.question: What happens when you read a book?

14.question: What happens when you inflate a balloon?

15.question: What happens when dough is baked?

communication.title: Visual Communication Cards
communication.subtitle: Picture Exchange Communication System - express your needs through images.
communication.composeHint: Tap cards to build a sentence.
communication.printHint: Tap cards to add to the basket.
communication.printSelectionHelp: Select cards to add to your basket.
communication.basketEmptyHelp: Go back to categories to add cards you want to print.
communication.printPoolLimitWarning: Your basket is near full or full. You can add up to 9 cards.
communication.printPoolLimitTooMany: You can select up to 9 cards to print. Please remove some.

premium.title: Premium Features
premium.desc: Remove ads, unlock themed UI (live backgrounds), view parent progress reports, and support development.
premium.mathQuestion:
Parent Gate:

Please solve this to continue:

{num1} + {num2} = ?
premium.confirmPurchase:
Confirm purchase?

This will be charged.

reset.title: Reset Progress
reset.subtitle: Deletes all data of {name}
reset.confirm: Are you sure you want to reset all progress for {name}? This cannot be undone.

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.subtitle: Earn a badge by completing an activity perfectly 3 times!

letters.noWordsForGroup: No words found for this group.
letters.couldNotCreateForLetter: Could not create this activity for the letter '{letter}'.

subtitles.findMiddle: Find the one in the middle

activityMgmt.enableAllHelp: Turn on/off all activities in this category
activityMgmt.title: Activity Management

consent.title: Privacy Consent
consent.body: To continue using the app, please accept our Privacy Policy. We do not collect personal data; your progress and settings stay on your device. Non-personalized ads may be shown in the free version.

objects.noTestForCategory: Could not create a test for this category.

learnTogether.title: Learn Together
learnTogether.text: Do activities with your child. Repeat the names of objects and ask questions about them ("Where does this animal live?", "What does this fruit taste like?"). This supports language development and strengthens your bond.

profile.title: Profile Management (Optional)
profile.text: On first launch, the app automatically creates a "Guest" profile. If you want to track multiple children separately, you can create new profiles from the Settings menu or switch between existing profiles.

themed.title: Themed UI
themed.text: Change the look of the app. 'Themed' mode has lively backgrounds, while 'Simple' mode offers a softer palette.

fastMode.title: Fast Mode
fastMode.text: Shortens feedback and speeds transitions between activities.

ban.title: Ban Image
ban.text: If your child dislikes an image, enable "Ban Image" in Settings and use the ban button during activities to hide it later.

achievements.title: Achievements Tab
achievements.text: Shows which categories your child has mastered. Earn a badge by completing an activity perfectly 3 times!

report.title: Progress Report
report.text: Highlights the most challenging and most successful activities for your child.

communication.title: Communication Cards
communication.text: Help your child express needs, feelings, or requests using the Communication Cards section.

customize.title: Customize Activities
customize.text: Use Activity Management in Settings to focus on specific skills or temporarily disable activities your child is not ready for.

randomMode.title: Try Random Mode
randomMode.text: Presents a shuffled mix of all enabled exercises from different categories to reinforce learning in a fun way.

practice.title: Practice Mode (Soon)
practice.text: Soon you'll be able to start a 'Practice Session' based on the activities your child struggles with the most.

parentReport.title: Progress Report
parentReport.noChallengesFound: No significant challenge areas found. Great job!
parentReport.noSuccessDataYet: More activities need to be completed to collect success data.
parentReport.recommendationFocusOn: You can start by focusing on the "{activityName}" activity that your child struggles with most.
parentReport.recommendationModel: When playing this activity again, you can be a role model and find the correct answers together.
parentReport.recommendationReinforce: Your child is very successful in "{activityName}"! You can try similar activities to reinforce their confidence in this area.
parentReport.recommendationGeneral: Continue the learning journey! You can help them acquire new skills by trying activities from different categories.

programReport.title: Program Mode Progress
programReport.completed: You've completed all units! Amazing achievement!
programReport.advanced: You're at an advanced level! Continuing with unit {unit}.
programReport.progressing: You're progressing well! Working on unit {unit}.
programReport.beginning: You're in the beginning stage. Continue with unit {unit}!
programReport.notStarted: Plan not started yet. You'll see progress here once you start program mode.
programReport.paceHint: You can advance up to 1 unit per day. This is the recommended pace for solid learning.

lineTracing.instruction: Follow the line with your finger. Stay on the line!

rhythmFollowing.instruction: First watch the rhythm, then tap/press and hold in the same way.

simplePuzzle.comingSoon: This activity will be added soon.

lineTracing.title: Line Tracing
lineTracing.subtitle: Follow the path with your finger

puzzle.title: Simple Puzzle
puzzle.subtitle: Drag the pieces to complete the picture

relativeComparison.title: Relative Comparison
relativeComparison.instruction: Compare the two open cards and answer the question.

1.correct: Correct! When it rains, we open an umbrella.
1.wrong: No, sunglasses are used in sunny weather.

2.correct: Correct! Ice cream melts in the sun.
2.wrong: No, ice cream doesn't freeze in snow, it's already cold.

3.correct: Correct! A seed grows in soil and becomes a plant.
3.wrong: No, a log is from cutting trees, not from seeds.

4.correct: Correct! Hands are cleaned by washing with soap.
4.wrong: No, those are dirty hands. They need cleaning.

5.correct: Correct! The egg breaks when dropped.
5.wrong: No, chicks hatch from eggs but not by dropping, through incubation.

6.correct: Correct! Fire burns by burning wood.
6.wrong: No, stones don't burn, you need wood for fire.

7.correct: Correct! The vase breaks when hit with a hammer.
7.wrong: No, vases are filled with water, they break with hammers.

8.correct: Correct! We wear a beanie when it snows, it keeps us warm.
8.wrong: No, shorts are worn in hot weather, not in winter.

9.correct: Correct! The baby drinks milk when hungry.
9.wrong: No, toys are for fun, milk is needed for hunger.

10.correct: Correct! The shirt is smoothed by ironing it.
10.wrong: No, scissors are for cutting, ironing is needed to smooth.

11.correct: Correct! When night comes, we go to bed to sleep.
11.wrong: No, balls are for daytime play, night is for sleeping.

12.correct: Correct! Flowers grow and develop with water.
12.wrong: No, scissors are for cutting, flowers need water to grow.

13.correct: Correct! We learn new things by reading books.
13.wrong: No, playing with balls is fun but reading books is needed to learn.

14.wrong: No, stones are hard and solid, they cannot be inflated.

15.correct: Correct! Dough becomes bread when baked.
15.wrong: No, refrigerators are for cooling, an oven is needed for baking.

1.correct: We hammer nails with a hammer.

2.correct: We brush our teeth with toothpaste.

4.correct: We use the pillow on the bed.

5.correct: We eat soup with a spoon.

6.correct: We paint the picture with a brush.

7.correct: We write on paper with a pen.

8.correct: We open the door with a key.

9.correct: We eat pasta with a fork.

10.correct: We put money in a piggy bank.

11.correct: We comb our hair with a comb.

12.correct: We read the book on the table.

14.correct: We cut bread with a knife.

15.correct: We wash our hands with soap.

5.correct: Yes, {item} is a vehicle; the others are fruit.

7.correct: Yes, {item} is clothing; the others are vehicles.
